meanings.sent1: The new antifrictions coating on the bike made it glide smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The antifrictions properties of the oil helped the engine run more efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The antifrictions spray turned the squeaky door into a silent ninja.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor acted as an antifrictions shield in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The antifrictions solution was like magic, making everything effortless.

meanings.definition: A substance or device used to reduce friction
meanings.sent1: The mechanic applied antifrictions to the gears to improve performance.
meanings.sent2: She used antifrictions on the conveyor belt to make the packages move smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The antifrictions gadget was a lifesaver for the rusty old machinery.
meanings.sent4: The antifrictions tool was like a superhero, saving the day for the squeaky hinges.
meanings.sent5: With the antifrictions in place, the wheels spun effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: The antifrictions material reduced wear and tear on the equipment.
meanings.sent2: The antifrictions properties of the gloves made gripping easier.
meanings.sent3: The antifrictions socks made sliding on the floor a fun game.
meanings.sent4: His words were like antifrictions, smoothing out the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The antifrictions surface felt like walking on clouds.
